about_the_game:
Celebrate Steel Division history with the Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44. This new major expansion introduces 14 of the original Steel Division: Normandy '44 divisions to its massively popular successor, Steel Division 2.

Covering the Normandy campaign in 1944 from D-Day, June 6th, to the Liberation of Paris on August 25th, Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44 is a long-requested community expansion, featuring battlegroups such as the Allied 101st Airborne Division, elite British Guards Armoured Division and French Demi-Brigade SAS special forces, to Axis Festung Groß-Paris, dreaded 1. SS-Panzerdivision "LSSAH",
and the one-of-a-kind 91. Luftlande-Division.

Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44 features all remaining divisions of the original game, completing the transfer of the predecessor’s arsenal to Steel Division 2.
All new divisions are playable solo, online, or cooperatively.

Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44 completes your Steel Division 2 experience with 14 new divisions from five nations, 200 new units, including brand-new vehicle and plane models, voice acting, and new infantry model sets.

MAIN FEATURES:

  • Command 14 new meticulously researched divisions from five nations (Allied USA, UK, Canada, France, and Axis Germany), as originally featured in Steel Division: Normandy '44.
  • Go to battle with 7 Axis battlegroups, reworked to fit Steel Division 2’s gameplay and features, including the veteran 2. Panzerdivision, the 9. Panzerdivision, the dreaded 1. SS-Panzerdivision "LSSAH", the 16. Luftwaffe-Feld-Division, improvised Festung Groß-Paris, the 91. Luftlande-Division, and the old and crippled defenders of the 716. Infanterie-Division.
  • Take command of the Allied veterans of the U.S. 1st Infantry Division, the famous 101st Airborne Division or light 4th Armored Division. The Commonwealth forces bring the British Guards Armoured Division steamroller, the war-weary 7th Armoured Division “Desert Rats”, or the mixed 4th Canadian Armoured Division. The French commandos from Demi-Brigade SAS wreak havoc in the enemy’s rear.
  • Access over 200 new units, with 14 brand-new vehicle models, 3 new plane models, as well as many new infantry squads and unit variants. Expand Steel Division 2’s arsenal with the Marder I auf 39H(f) tank destroyer, Flak 41 88mm AA gun, NAG 4500 Drilling heavy anti-air truck, the Canadian Wallaby heavy APC and Otter armored car. Aircraft include the American A-20G and B-25C bombers, as well as the unique Rosie the Rocketeer bazooka-equipped Piper Cub conversion.
  • New infantry model can be encountered in all nations, including 101st Airborne's famous Filthy Thirteen raiders, French SAS, and the Vichy-aligned Miliciens
    collaborationists.
  • Call on no less than 8 new heroic Aces, each deploying on the battlefield in a uniquely camouflaged or marked unit, including Sherman tank commander Creighton Abrams, paratrooper Lt.Richard Winters, Königstiger ace Kurt Knispel, or Fallschirmjäger legend Alexander Ulhig.
  • This expansion includes new voice-acting, including Allied Belgian and New Zealander pilots flying top cover.

Celebrate Steel Division history with the Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44. This new major expansion introduces 14 of the original Steel Division: Normandy '44 divisions to its massively popular successor, Steel Division 2.

short_description: Celebrate Steel Division history as you command 14 new divisions in Steel Division 2: Tribute to Normandy '44. This major expansion introduces the original Steel Division: Normandy 44’s battlegroups, updated with new arsenals, traits, soldier models, 200 new units, 8 new aces and new voice-acting.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
